title: Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu - Carmilla (BBC)
description:
From BBC Radio 4 Extra. Written by Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu; Full-cast dramatisation starring Anne-Marie Duff, David Warner, Brana Bajic, Celia Imrie and Kenneth Cranham; Dramatised by Don McCamphill.

A young woman finds her lonely existence in a remote Austrian castle enlivened by the arrival of a mysterious and beautiful visitor - Carmilla. What was the unworldly setting in which they last met?
